title: Look at Me - complex state of mind

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Egan uses literary elements and techniques to convey Moose’s complex state of mind.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Egan uses literary elements and techniques to convey Moose’s complex state of mind.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how a character's own choices, actions, and speech reveal complexities in that character, and explain the function of those complexities.
